Ari and Helene Bousbib collection of photographs
Ari and Helene Bousbib collection of photographs

This subseries contains portraits of William O'Dwyer (1890â€“1964), an Irish-American politician and diplomat who served as the Mayor of New York City from 1946 to 1950; and Alexander Woollcott (1887-1943), an American critic for The New Yorker magazine, a member of the Algonquin Round Table, and a prominent radio personality. The photographs were taken by several different photographers, some credited and some uncredited.
